profile.profile: I am a frontend software engineer, currently working for Stint and building beautiful websites and mobile apps.

jobExperience.title: Tesco Bank
points: I worked developing greenfield Next.JS applications to support customers in need, making sure that all of the security and quality standards are met. On top of that, I supported the testers and the helped with the process of deploying the apps to the customers
Upgraded many security apps that manage sensitive data, from Next 12 to Next 15
Cooperated closely with designers and testers to develop high standard application for thousands of customers
skills: React, TypeScript, Node.JS, Next.JS, AWS, Jest

jobExperience.title: Stint
points: Developed new features for the mobile application (Android and iOS) in React Native and in the second version of the mobile app, in Flutter
I worked on customizing key-cloak authentication system for the mobile and web users, both internal and external
skills: React Native, TypeScript, Python, GraphQL, Flutter

jobExperience.title: BBC News
points: Collaborated with UX designers, researchers, product managers and testers on building new features and visuals for BBC News page to get voters more engaged in Northern Ireland Elections 2022
Developed experimental frontend elements for testing purposes, like for example different types of interactive graphs

jobExperience.title: BBC Archive Services
points: Building internal search engine for Archive Search video and audio assets
Sharing knowledge of React with other engineers
skills: React.JS, Node.JS, AWS, Elastic Search, Jest, Cypress

jobExperience.title: Edinburgh Napier University
jobExperience.job: Student Assistant for Data Analytics Module
points: Helping students to understand Data Analytics

jobExperience.title: Computer Application Services
points: Project: tracking tool focused on gathering user engagement data. The data was later on programmatically cleaned and used to display Sankey diagram with user journey and user usage of app's tools.

jobExperience.title: University of Edinburgh
points: Helping users with operating financial systems
Fixing and updating systems with use of PL/SQL queries
Fixing and helping in managing database
Dissertation: Proof of Concept - Android Mobile Application for Customised Tourism
National Certificate, Higher National Certificate and Higher National Diploma

about_me.introduction: My interests are focused on the impact of technology on people's everyday life and how technology can improve things.
about_me.rest: I have experience working on web applications, mobile apps, designing websites, and working a bit on the backend where I was using AWS and Node.JS with Python. In my free time I enjoy reading, learning French and making small game projects.
